sentence.Network_en: Tears are signs of gladness as well as of grief.
sentence.Network_cn: 眼泪标志着悲伤,同样也标志着快乐.

sentence.Network_en: We behold the face of nature bright with gladness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们常常从光明、愉快的方面去看自然界的外貌.

sentence.Network_en: Gladness surged through Pamela to hear of the torn - up letters.
sentence.Network_cn: 听着信件的撕碎声,帕米拉胸中涌起了一阵喜悦.

Misgiving mixing unimaginable gladness made me feel dizzy ., 疑惧和望外的喜悦搅在一起 , 使我晕眩起来.

entry.def: If you are glad about something, you are happy and pleased about it.

example.ex: I'm glad I relented in the end...
example.tran: 我很高兴自己的态度最终缓和了下来。

example.ex: The people seem genuinely glad to see you...
example.tran: 这些人见到你好像发自内心地感到喜悦。

entry.def: If you say that you will be glad to do something, usually for someone else, you mean that you are willing and eager to do it.

example.ex: I'll be glad to show you everything...
example.tran: 我将很乐意向你们展示一切。

example.ex: We should be glad to answer any questions.
example.tran: 我们愿意回答任何问题。

auth_sentence.content: The mirrors of my house filled me with such a sense of gladness that a room without one struck me as a dark cell.
auth_sentence.res_content: The mirrors of my house filled me with such a sense of gladness that a room without one struck me as a dark cell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The mirrors of my house filled me with such a sense of gladness that a room without one struck me as a dark cell.

auth_sentence.content: This mature, rueful comedy sets out to marry grief and gladness, and achieves it.
auth_sentence.res_content: This mature, rueful comedy sets out to marry grief and gladness, and achieves it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This mature, rueful comedy sets out to marry grief and gladness, and achieves it.
